content.rendered:
TTE held its Strategy Conclave 2024 recently, an annual platform to highlight accomplishments of 2023 while sharing the strategic plan for the upcoming year. Group CEO Easa Al Gurg addressed the gathering and appreciated the collective efforts of the team. Held at a scenic seaside location in Ajman, the event was attended by Vamshi Patwari – Group HCD, Tanveer Shabandri – ECIG CEO, Dilip Sharma – Executive Vice President and key members of TTE. Each entity of TTE shared its goals for 2024 and insights from the present year.

The day of interactive discussions and presentations ended with fun outdoor team activities and some reflective meditation and breathing exercises. It was a fun day for all and the perfect way to strengthen team spirit and build anticipation as we reimagine the future together.
